Briefly describe what this PR does.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Platform addition

## Related Issue

Closes #(issue number)

- Change 1
- Change 2
- Change 3

## Testing

Describe how you tested these changes:

- [ ] Tested single comment workflow
- [ ] Tested batch mode
- [ ] Verified personalization works
- [ ] Checked tracking updates
- [ ] Tested on multiple subreddits/platforms

## Screenshots (if applicable)

Add screenshots to demonstrate the changes.

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have tested my changes thoroughly
- [ ] No personal information is included in commits
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed

Any additional information, concerns, or questions?
